segments.text: That ’ s it , my lease is up . I have to move .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ? Why ? Can ’ t you renew it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The owner apparently is selling this place to make way for the construction of a parking lot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I can help you pack . We should start looking for a new place for you ASAP .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I might move in with my parents for a couple of months until I can find something . You know how hard it is to find a decent place around here . I ’ m gonna have to put most of my stuff in storage for a while .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , let me know if there ’ s anything I can do to help out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , would you mind looking after my pet tarantula and snake for a couple of weeks ?
segments.speaker: S2
